name: Immunn'
description:
Immunn' is a game made in Global Game jam which is a state level Game jam.

Immunn has a plot where you play as a anti-virus in inside a human body as you may know, you basically have to kill bacteria and virus inside the body.  Player has the ability to grab, pull, throw. Player can kill a enemy by throwing them against them self or throw them against walls

Controls

w, a, s, d / Left Stick      - movements

Space / Left shoulder  - Grab enemies

I / A button                        - pull

P / Right shoulder         - throw

O / X button                     - get closer to enemy

U /  Y button                    - Leave the grab
